title: Nothing like the First Time
description: *This NA Contemporary Romance story contains sexual content and language aimed at a mature audience. 17+*Carly Summers and Greyston Sterling were each other's first kiss, first sexual experience, first love, first everything...They were a match made in Heaven, that was, until Grey took a job as a freelance photographer which took him to the other side of the world. When it came down to a choice between his career and his girl--he chose his career.Now, 10 years later, Grey's back in town and wants to see if they can rekindle what they had all those years ago. Carly has had relationships but nothing that lasted. No one ever compared to Grey.But how can they if he's engaged to somebody else?
author: Keren Hughes
